MAN.TITLE: nfreq
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: frequence of the values in a vector or matrix

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: real or complex vector or matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: Frequence of the values in a real or complex vector or a real or complex matrix x.

For a real or complex vector or a real or complex matrix x, m=freq(x) returns in the first column of the size(x,'*')x2 matrix m the values of x and in the second column of this matrix the frequences of the corresponding values.
Note that the tabul function is more efficient, applies also to vector of strings and returns a sorted m.

MAN.AUTHOR: Carlos Klimann
